article.title: SAIC Awarded $19 Million Task Order by Naval Undersea Warfare Center-Newport Division
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a prime contract by the Naval Undersea Warfare Center (NUWC)-Newport Division to provide engineering, technical and management services in support of NUWC's autonomous undersea vehicle engineering facility. The contract has a total value of more than $19 million if all options are exercised.
